crook.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: a dishonest person or a criminal
crook.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: The crooks got away across the park.
crook.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: a long stick with a curved end, used by people who look after sheep
crook.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: if you crook your finger or your arm, you bend it
